testcases = int(raw_input())
while testcases:
	testcases -= 1
	n = int(raw_input())
	inputs = []
	gotTheVotes = []
	for i in range(n):
		inputs.append(raw_input())
	votes = 0
	for i in reversed(inputs):
		nameVote = i.split(' ')
		if nameVote[0] in gotTheVotes:
			continue
		else:
			gotTheVotes.append(nameVote[0])
			if nameVote[1] == '+':
				votes += 1
			else:
				votes -= 1
	print votes
